entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:35 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.5°C

Observed at: Beauceville 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

Humidity: 86 %

Wind: SSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
